abstract: In a corporate blog post, Facebook reports on the increase in users at MOG and Spotify since they were integrated within Facebook. Ticketing companies, however, are waiting for Facebook integration to happen.
snippet: In a corporate blog post, Facebook reports on the increase in users at MOG and Spotify since they were integrated within Facebook. Ticketing companies, however, are waiting for Facebook integration to happen.
lead_paragraph: How much have the new features that Facebook introduced in September helped digital-music services like Spotify, MOG and Slacker? According to Facebook, quite a bit. But some of those companies are still waiting for the new features to take effect.

headline.main: Facebook Says It Provides a Big Boost to Digital-Music Sites
